name: Energy Soap Bar
description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps.
No Synthethic Fragrances or Colorants

This soap contains essential oils that's great to awaken the mind and body and make you feel more vibrant as you get your day started.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil,  Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Shea Butter, Mango Butter, Castor Oil, Fragrance Blend.

Mango Butter is highly emollient, softening and soothing to the skin.

Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces

NOTE: Color may vary from batch to batch, may appear darker or lighter than photo shown. This is normal during a 4-6 weeks curing process.

Price shown is for one bar of soap

*Lye is necessary to make soap, however a cured/finished bar of soap does not contain any lye*

Mango Butter is highly emollient, softening and soothing to the skin.

name: Skin Clearing Oil Cleanser
description:
I'm proud to introduce the new Skin Clearing Oil Cleanser to you guys.  A product that has been in my skin care regimen for quite a while now and is at the top of the list when it comes to clearing blemishes and removing impurities that may be skin deep.

This cleanser helps to normalize the skin to provide a radiant glow, something I pride myself on having year round.

The Oil Cleansing Method is simply of course, cleansing your face with oil. A lot of people are afraid of this method for fear that their skin will break out, however, oil alone does not create blemishes and a good thing to know is oil dissolves oil so it can be used on any skin type. Acne/Blemishes are caused by several factors such as age, hormones, bacteria, dead skin cells and the buildup of these factors.

Most products strip the oil out of our skin, leaving our largest organ trying to repair itself by replacing the oil stripped away…yes that’s right, your skin naturally secretes oil, even when it feels dry, it has oil on it.  When you strip your skin of its sebum, it goes into overdrive, trying to create more. Which leads to clogged pores, blackheads, whiteheads, you name it.  Your skin may go through a phase for up to 3 weeks where it is getting rid of impurities, this is the time where you want to be patient let the oil cleanser do its thing, clear and normalize your skin.

Castor Oil - gives you the most cleansing compared to other oils, it draws out dirt, bacteria, dead skin cells and anything else trapped in your pores.  It also heals the skin. 

Grapeseed Oil - High in Vitamin C and E, a powerhouse in the fight against aging, stabilizing collagen and elastin in the skin while treating the issues our largest organ faces.

Jojoba Oil - Closely resembles sebum of skin, rich in Vitamin E and promotes a glowing complexion. Non-comedogenic (does not clog pores).

Argan Oil - It is rich in vitamin E, carotenes, antioxidants and essential fatty acids, great anti-aging ingredient

Baobab Oil - improves elasticity, encourages regeneration of cells and does not clog pours, also contains Vitamins A, D, and E, as well as the essential fatty acids to aid the dry winter skin,  easily and quickly absorbed by the skin leaving no oiliness or greasiness.

Ingredients: Castor Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Argan Oil and Baobab Oil.

Product is unscented

2 oz size only, should last 6-8 weeks.

Instructions on how to use is included on container labels.

name: Blueberry Sorbet Soap Bar
description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps.
No Synthethic Fragrances or Colorants

With warm weather comes the potential skin damage from being out in the sun.  This soap contains powerful antioxidants to retain moisture and protect the skin, while enhancing it's appearance. Also contains blueberry seeds to gently exfoliate the skin.  Can be used on face and body


*Smells very edilble but for EXTERNAL use only*

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil,  Blueberry Seed Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Blueberry Seed Butter, Castor Oil, Sunflower Oil,  Blueberry Seeds,  Acai and Blueberry Fragrance 

BLUEBERRY SEED OIL: One of nature’s most powerful antioxidants.  Blueberry oil is very effective for cell and tissue regeneration. Excellent for treating sensitive and oily skin, skin with large pores . It is nourishing, moisturizing and helps to heal and treat skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis. Research shows that blueberry seed oil possesses significant free radical scavenging properties.  Antioxidants enhance your protection from the sun.  A reservoir in the skin provides longer protection.  Antioxidants can even reverse prior photo damage.  And they protect from environmental pollutants which a recent study concluded accelerated skin aging, both in wrinkling, and in age spot formation.

It is rich in essential fatty acids and phytonutrients. The oil is also very light, stable, and absorbs quickly into the skin

SUNFLOWER OIL: is an all natural, healthy way to heal skin and maintain its health; and its calming and emollient (moisturizing) properties have been known for years. Sunflower oil has many medicinal and cosmetic uses and may be helpful if you are suffering from acne, eczema, inflammation, general redness and irritation of the skin. It’s also a great product to use on your newborn baby for extra skin protection.

BLUBERRY SEEDS:   naturally & gently exfoliates the skin.

Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces

NOTE: Color may vary from batch to batch, may appear darker or lighter than photo shown. This is normal during a 4-6 weeks curing process.

Price shown is for one bar of soap

*Lye is necessary to make soap, however a cured/finished bar of soap does not contain any lye*

name: Ease Leave-In
description:
A Moisturizing Leave-In Conditioner.  This is a multipurpose product that can also be used as a moisturizer, detangler, great for styles like wash & gos, finger coils and to set twists and braids, before adding a sealant to lock in moisture.

Nourishing herbs, oils and extracts have been included to provide a lasting, moisturizing effect,  to help avoid having to add product to your hair daily.

Can be used on dry or damp hair of any texture.  A little goes a long way

Ingredients: Distilled Water infused with Slippery Elm, Orange Peel, Marshmallow Root and Hibiscus Petal Flower;  Aloe Vera Juice, Olive Oil, Aloe Vera Oil,  Flaxseed Oil, Castor Oil, Behentrimonium Methosulfate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (Conditioning Emulsifier), Honey Quat, Aloe Vera Extract, Honeysuckle Flower Extract, Horsetail Extract, Bamboo Extract, Seal Kelp Extract, Pro Vitamin B5, Guar Guam, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Essential Oil Blend, Vitamin E and Fragrance.

Does not contain any Sulfates, Parabens, Silicones, Mineral Oil, Petroleum, or Synthetic Fragrances

Has a light, fruity scent.

name: Kiddies 'n Curls Moisturizer
description:
This moisturizer was formulated to provide nourishment and long lasting moisture on the delicate strands of our little ones.

Can also be used as a leave-in conditioner.  Lightweight to touch but only a small amount is needed to properly moisturize the hair.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, Mango Butter, Aloe Butter, Emulsifying Wax (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (Conditioning Emulsifier), Safflower Oil, Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Castor Oil,  Jojobal Oil, Citric Acid, Guar Gum, Pro Vitamin B5, Potassium Sorbate, Vitamin E and Fragrance

MANGO BUTTER- contains natural emollient qualities that help keep the skin moisturized, therefore when applied to the scalp it restores and maintains the moisture and promotes cell regeneration

ALOE BUTTER: contains minerals, vitamins, amino acids and enzymes that makes hair and skin soft and moisturized.

SAFFLOWER OIL -Easily absorbed and very moisturizing.  It is a delicate oil high in Vitamin E that conditions hair and hydrates hair and skin

AVOCADO OIL It’s loaded with nutrients, amino acids, essential fatty acids, as well as vitamins A, B, D, and E.  And it’s excellent for moisturizing, deep conditioning, improving hair strength, strengthening hair, and boosting shine.



Can be used on damp or dry hair.  Part hair into sections and apply product from root to tip.  Finger comb through until completely dissolved. Be sure to lock in moisture with a sealant such as the Nourishing Amazon Hair & Body Butter available in Baby Scent.

name: More Moisture Cream
description:
Previously named Más Humedad which is Spanish for "More Moisture"...we decided to drop the spanish but the ingredients/formula.

This product has been formulated to aid in styling and can be used as a leave-in conditioner.  Providing a high level of moisture and nourishment  for your hair as well as definition, sheen and strengthening properties.  Great to solve issues with dryness and works well on thick/coarse hair and this is a heavier cream.

Ingredients: Distilled water infused with Slippery Elm (leaves hair soft and manageable), Sea Kelp (Mineral rich, conditions and strengthens), Horsetail (rejuvenates hair follicles),  Orange Peel (makes hair soft, shine and manageable), Marshmallow Root (natural moisturizer, hydrates hair and scalp, rich in proteins and vitamins A and C), Aloe Vera Juice. Behentrimonium Methosulfate (and) Cetearyl Alcohol (Conditioning Emulsifier) Aloe Vera Extract, Raw Shea Butter, Cupuacu Butter, Rosehip Oil, Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Vitamin E, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate (food grade preservative) and Essential Oil Blend for Fragrance

Best to use on damp hair followed by one of our hair butters as a sealant or your favorite hair oil.  A little goes a long way.

Does not contain any Parabens, Silicones, Mineral Oil or Sulfates

8 oz and 16 oz sizes

name: Twirly Hair Gel
description:
This styling gel is perfect for any hair type, whether straight, curly, wavy or kinky.

Perfect for wash and gos, twists/twist outs, braid/braid outs and to hold the hair in an updo style.  It has been formulated to give the hair a soft hold while keeping it detangled, shiny with no flakes or crunchy feeling.  This product also helps control frizz while giving curl definition and shine.

For better curl definition: Best to use on clean, wet or damp hair, alone or after applying a leave-in conditioner or water-based moisturizer (pairs well with our Ease Leave-In Conditioner). Simply section the hair and add your leave-in by finger combing through then add Twirly Hair Gel and repeat process. A light sealant can also be added to lock in moisture after hair dries.

Start with a small amount to avoid over-moisturizing your hair.

Can also be used on dry hair as well.


Ingredients: Aloe Vera Juice, Distilled Water infused with Horsetail, Marshmallow Root, Yucca Root, Flax Seeds and Orange Peel. Linden Flower Extract, Hibiscus Flower Extract, Castor Oil, Jojoba Oil, Flax Seed Oil, Agave Nectar, Honey Quat, Aloe Vera Extract, Xanthan Gum, Pro-Vitamin B5, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Vitamin E, Essential Oil Blend

Alcohol-Free product

8 oz and 16 oz sizes available

*Please NOTE: Your bottle may come with a pump or disc top depending on availability*

name: Brahmi Root Hair Masque (Deep Treatment)
description:
Deep treatment that includes ayurvedic herbs to aid in strengthening, conditioning, and moisturizing.  Repairs, restores and promotes healthy hair growth.  Makes hair soft and easier to manage. Also detangles hair for easier styling even after rinsing.

Ingredients: Distilled Water and infused with Brahmi, Burdock Root, Marshmallow Root, Yucca Root, Slippery Elm and Horsetail, Aloe Vera Juice, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Avocado Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Castor Oil, Raw Honey, Guar Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Pro Vitamin B5, Hydrolized Wheat Protein, Essential Oil Blend for Fragrance.


Apply to freshly washed, damp hair for about 30 - 45 minutes with a shower cap alone or under a hair steamer.  Rinse with cool water and style as desired.

name: Ayurvedic Hair and Scalp Mist
description:
Softens and conditions hair while giving a boost of moisture.  This products promotes healthy hair, can be used as a pre-poo treatment on hair and scalp, or to dampen hair before styling. A great conditioning refresher for when wearing braids, twists and sew-ins to keep the hair and scalp moisturized and healthy.

This product can be used daily to mist the hair before applying moisturizer, sealant and styling.

Infused with herbs to restore moisture, promote growth and treat hair and scalp.

INGREDIENTS: Distilled water infused with Sea Kelp, Hibiscus Petal, Amla, Bhringraj, Marshmallow Root, Fenugreek, Ginger 
Aloe Vera Juice, Apple Cider Vinegar, Coconut Oil, Wheat Germ Oil, Vitamin E, Essential Oil Blend, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, and Pro-Vitamin B5

PH Level: 5

name: Silky Aloe Curl Pudding
description:
Conditions and seals moisture while defining curls, provides texture boost and shine.


This product also contains an herbal infusion to treat hair while showing off your latest style

For best results use on clean, wet or dry hair after applying a leave-in conditioner.  Works great on braid outs, twists outs and for twist locs/dreads.  Section hair and apply product through out hair until completely dissolved.  

INGREDIENTS: Aloe Vera Gel, Unrefined Shea Butter, Olive Oil infused with hibiscus petal flower and orange peel, sea kelp and horsetail; Aloe Butter, Castor oil, Jojoba oil, Glycerine, Hemp Seed Oil,  Vitamin E, Optiphen (natural preservative) and Essential Oil Blend!!  Light, clean fragrance

8 oz size and 16 oz size only

NOTE: This product can be customized for customers who suffer from allergies such as nuts (shea butter) or orange peel.  Please contact owner in advance to discuss your options.

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

name: Apricot Mango Loc &Twist Pomade
description:
Daily sheen and conditioning for natural or relaxed hair, wet or dry.  

Provides a soft hold for twists, braids, and locs yet will wash out of the hair easily. Can also be used as scalp grease, or to seal in moisture on twist outs or braid outs.

This product can be used by men if you're looking for a nice, sheen for a low-cut hairstyle.

A little goes a long way!

MANGO BUTTER- contains natural emollient qualities that help keep the skin moisturized, therefore when applied to the scalp it restores and maintains the moisture and promotes cell regeneration

APRICOT KERNEL OIL - softens hair and adds shine

6 oz size

Ingredients: Coconut oil, Unrefined Mango Butter, Jojoba Oil, Olive Oil, Candelilla Wax, Apricot Kernel oil, Castor Oil, Vitamin E, Essential Oil blend for fragrance

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

name: Nettle Leaf Mud Cleanser
description:
A gentle way to cleanse without stripping hair of natural oils, strengthens and provides a nourishing herbal treatment.

I have been a huge fan of mud cleansers for quite some time and have definitely seen an improvement in the feel and strength of my hair.

Lathers very well and leaves a silky feel.

Ingredients: Distilled Water infused with Sea Kelp, Rhassoul Clay and Yarrow Root, Nettle Leaf Extract, Elder Flower Extract, Linden Flower Extract, Peppermint Leaf Extract, Yucca Root Extract, Coco Glucoside (Natural Surfactant), Glycol Stearate, Glycerin, Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Panthenol, Organic Castile Soap, Citric Acid, Essential Oil Blend

8 oz size only

Directions: Rinse hair with warm water for a few seconds, allowing the hair to be fully saturated.  Apply a small amount of shampoo to scalp and massage it in to remove dirt and buildup.  Repeat if necessary, rinse and Follow up with Ease Leave-In Conditioner

Shake well before using

name: Creamy Exfoliating Facial Cleanser
description:
This cleanser has been formulated to leave the skin soft, toned, polished and refreshed. Contains extracts to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals, and highly moisturizing and anti-aging properties.

Jojoba Beads and Walnut Shells are included to gently polish away dead skin cells for a youthful look.

Also works well with our Vibrant Radiance Face Cream for women and Soothing Beard/Facial Moisturizer for men.

Coco Glucoside - natural foaming agent derived from renewable raw materials such as coconut oil and fruit sugars, and is completely biodegradable. Does not contain any sulfates, parabens or formaldehyde.

Blueberry Seed Oil - Potent Antioxidant, enhances moisture, rich in essential fatty acids (body requires for good health)

Evening Primrose Oil - nourishes the skin, fights the effect of aging and skin irritations

Green Tea Extract - has natural antioxidants (called catechins) that help fight damage caused by free radicals. Animal studies have showed protection from skin cancer. Both animal and human studies have demonstrated that topical green tea formulations reduce sun damage

Oat Extract - Soothing for all types of skin, retains moisture and fights against aging.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Fractioned Coconut Oil, Coco Glucoside, Blueberry Seed Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Mango Butter, Glycerin, Green Tea Extract, Oat Extract, Pumpkin Seed Extract, Witch Hazel Extract, Goat Milk, Potassium Sorbate, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Silk Fiber, Jojoba Beads, Walnut Shells, Essential Oil Blend for light citrus scent and Vitamin E. 

Use as a normal facial cleanser, rinse with cool water and apply one of our face moisturizers.

Available in 4 oz size only.

name: Stimulating Herbal Oil
description:
Strengthens and conditions while stimulating hair growth.  Massage into scalp daily, can be used as a pre-poo treatment.

Helps to relieve dry, flaky scalp and heals irritations leaving scalp more healthy.

This oil is infused with herbs such as Bhringraj, Nettle, Horestail and Calendula.  Some stimulating essential oils includes, tea tree, peppermint, clove, and sage.

KEY INGREDIENTS:

BHRINRAJ: Strengthens root of hair and improves general hair conedition

NETTLE: Regenerates and grows hair

HORSETAIL:  Rejuvenates hair follices to trigger growth

CALENDULA:  Soothes, regenerates and heal the scalp to aid in helping hair grow

OLIVE OIL: Excellent moisturizer, nourishes hair, absorbs quickly, repairs split ends and makes hair shiny and silky

HEMP SEED OIL: Rich in vitamins, imparts gloss and manageability of hair, protectant

CASTOR OIL: Has anti-fungal, antiviral and antibacterial properties- so it can be effective for treating skin/scalp infections like ringworm. Prevents the dry and itchy scalp and is a treatment for hair thinning and hair loss

4 oz size only

*PLEASE NOTE: Your bottle may be clear or dark amber depending on availability, will not hinder product performance*

name: Five Blend Tummy Butter
description:
This butter has been formulated to fade scars and stretch marks on the tummy and other areas of the skin. Ingredients also help to hydrate, smooth, soften, protect, regenerate and heal the skin while improving elasticity.

Contains 5 butters that all work together to keep the skin looking it's best.  We've tested this butter on old and new scars to ensure it benefits 

RAW COCOA BUTTER - It lubricates and protects the skin and also helps to fade scars, natural moisturizer which softens and can be easily absorbed by the skin

COFFEE BUTTER – Reduces the appearance of cellulite, heals stretch marks and scarring, tightens and tones skin, softens and hydrates skin for a glowing, youthful look.  Coffee Butter also has a 4.5 pH balance which is the same as human skin and the reason why it helps protect against and get rid of acne and blemishes.

CUPUACU (Coo-Pwah-Sue) BUTTER - Enhances elasticity, helps aging skin absorb water, gives long lasting hydration to  dry, damaged skin, high in Vitamin C.  It is also a natural sunscreen.

MANGO BUTTER- contains natural emollient qualities that help keep the skin moisturized, restores and maintains the moisture and promotes cell regeneration.  Mango Butter is also reputed to be useful for treating burns, stretch marks, scar reduction, smoothing wrinkles and rich in antioxidants

TUCUMA BUTTER – Found in the Amazon Rain Forest in Brazil, the tucuma butter is an excellent emollient. High in vitamin A, the antioxidant properties in this exotic Amazonian butter help to keep the skin soft, smooth and nourished.

BAOBAB OIL - Rich in Vitamin A, D, E and F.  Improves skin tone, elasticity, regenerates and renews skin cells...does not clog pores (Baobab tree grows in Africa)

MORINGA OIL - Moringa is loaded with antioxidants and nutrients that will help one achieve a healthy and glowing skin. It helps in smoothing wrinkles, nourishes and protects the skin from free radical damage.

Ingredients: Raw Cocoa Butter, Coffee Butter, Cupuacu Butter, Mango Butter, Tucuma Butter, Baobab Oil, Moringa Oil, Argan Oil, Coconut Oil, Carrot Oil, Rosehip Oil, Vitamin E, Phthalate Free Fragrance in Butter Cream, Essential Oil Blend.

Available in 6 oz  and 12oz size only.  Best to use on clean skin immediately after shower or bath.

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container

name: Vibrant Radiance Face Cream
description:
I wanted to make a face cream to combat dry skin during the harsh winter months while leaving the skin looking replenished rejuvenated while reducing blemishes and age spots.

I've tried it as a day and night cream, under makeup and can't say enough how awesome my skin felt and looked. This cream absorbs quickly without leaving a greasy feeling so works great during the summer months...is lightly scented as well! A definite spa treatment for your face!

KEY INGREDIENTS INCLUDES:

Soy Butter - Rehydrates and replenishes the skin's lipids to help hold moisture, while softening dry, damaging skin

Unrefined Mango Butter - contains natural emollient qualities that help keep the skin moisturized and soft

Baobab Oil - Rich in Vitamin A, D, E and F.  Improves skin tone, elasticity, regenerates and renews skin cells...does not clog pores (Baobab tree grows in Africa)

Sweet Almond Oil - Softens and reconditions the skin, nourishing and absorbs quickly

Blueberry Seed Oil - Potent Antioxidant, enhances moisture, rich in essential fatty acids (body requires for good health)

Argan Oil - Rich in Vitamin E, carotenes and antioxidants

Camellia Seed Oil - refines mature skin, nourishes the complexion, easily absorbed

I have used this cream on other areas of the skin as well...couldn't help myself so feel free!!!

2 oz sample and 6 oz size only

Use on skin immediately after cleansing for best results!

A little goes a long way so while you may want to rub the entire jar on your skin...you don't need to! :-)

Ingredients: Distilled water, Unrefined Mango Butter, Soy Butter, Vegetable Emulsifier, Blueberry Seed Oil, Baobab Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Camellia Seed Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol,  Argan Oil, Guar Gum, Vitamin E, Optiphen (Natural Preservative) and Phthalate-Free Fragrance

For custom orders in bigger size send email to laceenterprise@gmail.com

name: Soothing Beard/Facial Moisturizer (For Men)
description:
This product can be used as a facial moisturizer and soothing beard lotion.  It  is formulated to moisturized the skin and beard while preventing razor bumps and in-grown hairs.  Can be used day or night and immediately after shaving.

Ingredients: Distilled water, Aloe Vera Juice, Unrefined Mango Butter, Cocoa Butter, Vegetable Emulsifier, Pumpkin Seed Oil, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Castor Oil, Olive Oil, Calendula Herbal Oil, Neem Oil, Andiroba Oil, Witch Hazel, White Willow Bark Extract, Green Tea Extract, Vitamin E, Guar Gum, Potassium Sorbate (Food Grade Preservative), Essential Oil Blend.

Light, masculine scent


6 oz jar only

name: Nourishing Amazon Hair & Body Butter
description:
This product has so many benefits and wonderful ingredients. This butter nourishes and protects the hair and skin.  Best to use on clean skin fresh out of the shower or bath, and on wet or dry hair. Helps to control frizz, great as a sealant.

Can be used on kids and babies hair and skin also

Two of our key ingredients are derived from plants that grow in the Amazon Rain Forest in South America and they are Murumuru Butter and Cupuacu Butter.

Murumuru Butter - Rich in Vitamin A and oleic provides nutrition, protective emollient, restores natural softness and gloss to dry, damage hair, lifeless hair.  A powerful skin barrier, repair agent and natural moisturizer.  

Cupuacu (Coo-Pwah-Sue) Butter - Enhances elasticity, helps aging skin absorb water, gives long lasting hydration to  dry, damaged hair and skin, high in Vitamin C.  It is also a natural sunscreen.

Meadowfoam Oil - Moisturizes skin, rejuvenates and add shine to hair

Argan Oil - rich in vitamin E, carotenes and antioxidants

Ingredients: Murumuru Butter, Cupuacu Butter, Unrefined Mango Butter, Unrefined Shea Butter, Argan oil, Olive Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Avocado Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Calendula Oil, Vitamin E and Fragrance

Choose fragrance in drop down box or select unscented.

NOTE: This product can be customized for customers who suffer from allergies such (shea butter).  Please contact us in advance to discuss your options.

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

8 oz, 16 oz  and 32 oz size available (For 32 oz size leave your scent option in the "comments section" during checkout)

*NOTE* FALL LIMITED SCENT OPTIONS COMES IN: Pumpkin Pie, Chai Tea and Black Vanilla, if you choose this option please add your scent choose in the comment section (Note to Seller)

name: Cocoa Tangerine Body Butter
description:
I'm proud to introduce this butter loaded with moisturizing ingredients and vitamins.

This butter has a light, sweet cocoa citrus smell that's not overbearing but lingers and creates a pleasant feel.

For best results, use on clean skin after a shower or bath, body butters work as a sealant so for longer moisturizing effect, apply while your skin is a little damp.

KEY INGREDIENTS INCLUDES:

RAW COCOA BUTTER - It lubricates and protects the skin and also helps to fade scars, natural moisturizer which softens and can be easily absorbed by the skin

ILLIPE BUTTER - has long-lasting moisturizing attributes

TANGERINE AND ORANGE BUTTER - High levels of Vitamin E and C to hydrate and soften the skin while creating a nice glow

SUNFLOWER OIL -  has high amounts of Vitamins A, B, D and E, minerals, natural moisturizer, absorbs quickly...great for use in massages

SWEET ALMOND OIL - excellent emollient and is known for its ability to soften and re-condition the skin, considered extremely nourishing and also great for use in massages

8 oz, 16 oz  and 32 oz size available

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Illipe Butter, Orange Butter, Tangerine Butter, Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sunflower Oil, Olive Oil, Vitamin E and Essential Oil Blend for Fragrance

For custom orders in bigger size send email to laceenterprise@gmail.com

name: Lavender Chamomile Spa Blend
description:
Aromatherapy body butter.  Brings the wonderful aroma and mood of a spa into your own home. Offers a calming, soothing aroma while moisturizing and replenishing the skin.

Lavender- has numerous benefits for the skin including calming scent. It offers both physical and emotional relief for problems as varied as migraines, insomnia, skin problems, infections, stress and nervous tension.

Chamomile- also has a calming aroma. Chamomile Butter is used to treat conditions such as dermatitis, eczema, burns and other irritations of the skin. This very gentle skin tonic is ideal to replenish and enrich dry or sensitive skin.

Ingredients: Lavender Butter, Chamomile Butter, Unrefined Shea Butter, Blueberry Butter, Avocado Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Macadamia Nut oil, Essential Oil Blend and Vitamin E

NOTE: This product can be customized for customers who suffer from allergies such as nuts (Shea butter). Please contact owner in advance to discuss your options.

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

8 oz, 16 oz  and 32 oz size available

name: Supreme Herbal Butter
description:
A great sealant to lock in moisture on dry or damp hair and skin.  Makes hair soft and manageable while providing nourishment (hair and skin), strengthens and conditions hair.

This butter is also a good option to help with skin irritations such as eczema and mild psoriasis.  It helps to alliviate itchy, dry skin for better comfort.  

This products contains an herbal infusion of Amla, Brahmi, Hibiscus Petal Flower, Horsetail and Bhringraj.

KEY INGREDIENTS: Unrefined Shea Butter, Unrefined Mango Butter, Olive Oil infused with Amla, Brahmi, Hibiscus petal Flower, Horsetail and Bhringraj, Coconut Oil and Wheatgerm Oil.  Essential Oil Blend for fragrance and stimulating purposes.

Store in a cool, dark place away from water.  A little goes a long way

8 oz, 16 oz  and 32 oz size available (For 32 oz size leave your scent option in the "comments section" during checkout)


NOTE: This product can be customized for customers who suffer from allergies such as nuts (shea butter).  Please contact owner in advance to discuss your options.

The appearance may change from due to the herbal infusion included in this product but all ingredients stay the same.

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

Bigger size available in 32 oz...add you scent in the "Note" section during checkout

options.name: 8 oz White Tea and Pear (For Men)
8 oz Red Currant and Thyme (For Men)
16 oz White Tea and Pear (For Men)

name: Plantain Leaf Healing Balm
description:
This product was inspired by my daughter who has a mild case of eczema.  I wanted to make a balm to give her skin relief from itching and other irritations, keep it moisturized, and offer a natural way of aiding in the healing process.  


This product is not a cure for any skin condition...as of yet there is no cure for eczema.  

KEY INGREDIENTS INCLUDES:

Plantain Leaf Herbal Oil – Provides relief for rashes, contact dermatitis, eczema, psoriasis, cuts and bleeding wounds

St. John’s Wort Herbal Oil – particularly soothing to inflamed nerves, effective on sprains, burns, bruises

Calendula Flower Herbal Oil – assists with dry and damaged skin, skin inflammations, rashes, diaper irritations, and other skin disorders …great on sensitive skin

Comfrey Herbal Oil – general wound healing, treatment of bruises and for skin cell proliferation

Other ingredients includes: Coconut Oil, Borage Seed Oil, Shea Nut Oil and Andiroba Oil

2 oz tin can only

Scented and Unscented options available

Store in a cool, dark place.  Do not allow water to get into your container.

name: Brown Sugar Cafe' Scrub
description:
This scrub is great to reduce the appearance of skin damage while tightening the skin.  Oils like Rosehip, Coconut Oil, and Jojoba Oil keeps skin from drying out while exfoliation takes place.

Ingredients: Fresh Coffee Grounds, Brown Sugar, Virgin Coconut Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Raw Honey, Castor Oil, Vitamin E, Carrot Extract, Essential Oil Blend, Natural Preservative

Coffee Grounds - 

The caffeine found in coffee scrubs typically increases blood flow and may reduce the appearance of cellulite and varicose veins. 
Caffeine is a vasodilator, which means it constricts blood vessels in the skin. This action works to make blood vessels tighter and firmer very quickly, which is reflected in your skin texture

Brown Sugar -

Exfoliating the skin with a brown sugar scrub cleans and tightens pores giving the skin a more even uniform appearance; pores look smaller, skin tone more even. It can also diminish the damage to the skin caused by acne and other skin conditions

Rosehip Oil - Has skin healing properties, high in essential fatty acids and is known to help treat dry, irritated, weathered skin.  Absorbs quickly without leaving skin oily.

Use in shower after running warm water over body for a few seconds.  Do not use on cuts/open wounds or allow water to get into your container.

name: Scrub Me Lovely
description:
A creamy scrub that gently exfoliates and leaves skin moisturized and soft.

Best to use while in shower, after running water over your skin for a few minutes. Scoop a little out with a spoon, put into your hands and rub over skin. Do not allow water to get into your scrub as that will create grounds for bacteria. to grow. Rinse off and moisturize with one of our wonderful body butters.

Ingredients: Fine Brown Sugar, Demerara Sugar, Mango Butter, Soy Butter, Hazelnut Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil, Evening Primrose, Walnut Shells, Raw Honey, Vitamin E, Essential Oil Blend and Fragrance.

6 oz size only

name: Serene Bath and Body Oil
description:
An Aphrodisiac Blend to awaken your senses. Great for a bath or to massage into skin, has a light sweet smell and luscious feeling.

Ingredients: Sunflower Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Fractioned Coconut Oil, Apricot Kernel oil, Herbal Oil Infusion, Essential Oil Blend (to increase sensuality) and Vitamin E.

2 oz size only

name: L.A.C.E Mini Sample Pack/Meetup Packs
description:
Want to try a product and see how it works for your hair and skin before buying a full size?  L.A.C.E offers 5 products in 2 oz sample sizes to give you a taste of what you can experience when you buy a bigger jar or bottle.

Both Mini Sample Pack and Meetup Sample Packs items includes:

More Moisture Cream
Silky Aloe Curl Pudding
Twirly Hair Gel
Apricot Mango Loc & Twist Pomade
Nettle Leave Mud Cleanser


Sample Pack is $ 25

PLEASE NOTE: Items in Mini Sample Pack CANNOT be substituted for an item not included

**MEETUP SAMPLE PACKS*

Having a Meetup and needs items for Swag Bags or Giveaways? We offer 25 sample jars for $50.  You can mix and match items, for example, 5 of each.

**Please allow 2 weeks for items to be processed and shipped** 

Send an email to laceenterprise@gmail.com with items to be included in sample pack.

description:

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Olive Oil, Honey, Calendula Wax, Jojoba Oil, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E, Flavor Oil, Essential Oil Blend

description:

name: Clear & Smooth Set
description:
Highly request by our female customers.

In an effort to keep our skin the best looking as possible, we've done extensive research on fading scars and stretch marks and put together this set to assist in your skin's needs.

Set Contains:
(8oz)Brown Sugar Cafe' Scrub
(6oz)Five Blend Tummy Butter
Full size Cafe'Chino Soap Bar


Brown Sugar Cafe Scrub ingredients:
Fresh Coffee Grounds, Brown Sugar, Virgin Coconut Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Rosehip Oil, Jojoba Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Raw Honey, Castor Oil, Vitamin E, Carrot Extract, Essential Oil Blend, Natural Preservative

Coffee Grounds - 

The caffeine found in coffee scrubs typically increases blood flow and may reduce the appearance of cellulite and varicose veins. 
Caffeine is a vasodilator, which means it constricts blood vessels in the skin. This action works to make blood vessels tighter and firmer very quickly, which is reflected in your skin texture

Brown Sugar -

Exfoliating the skin with a brown sugar scrub cleans and tightens pores giving the skin a more even uniform appearance; pores look smaller, skin tone more even. It can also diminish the damage to the skin caused by acne and other skin conditions

Five Blend Tummy Butter (See Body Butters for description)

Cafe'Chino Soap Bar -

Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Raw Cocoa Butter, Coffee Butter, Castor Oil, Cocoa Powder and Chocolate Espresso Fragrance

This soap is formulated to compliment scrub and body butter to improve the overall condition of the skin.

*Lye is necessary to make soap, however a cured/finished bar of soap does not contain any lye*

Please Note: Items cannot be substituted for another item not included in gift set

name: Herbal Tea Rinse
description:
Two types of tea rinses are available to assist in healthy hair and scalp. 

1. Breakage/Shedding and Thinning

Herbs includes:

Brahmi
Bhringraj
Amla
Hibiscus Petal
Horsetail
Fenugreek
Nettle
Lavender
Rosemary

2. Conditioning and Strengthening

Marshmallow Root
Neem
Hibiscus Petal
Aloe Vera Leaf
Amla
Horsetail
Orange Peel

6 oz Jar available

Instructions will be inlcuded in your order on how to do a rinse.
Dried herbs and powders included only

name: Rhassoul & Bentonite Clay Shampoo Bar
description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps.
No Synthethic Fragrances or Colorants

This is a totally amazing soap that can also be used as a detoxifying facial cleanser.  It has been formulated to clarify the  hair so that shampoo is not needed often.  Has a great lather so a little goes a long way for deep cleansing of hair and skin.  Will not strip hair or skin of moisture.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Aloe Butter,  Castor Oil, Rhassoul Clay, Bentonite Clay, Amla Powder, Honey and Essential Oil Blend for Fragrance

Rhassoul Clay:  Mineral-rich clay that contains high levels of skin-healing silica, potassium and magnesium.  It clarifies without stripping the hair of natural oils, nourishes the hair, leaves hair soft and shiny and enhances its volume, removes dandruff and eases problems of excessively oily hair.

ON SKIN: 

Reduces dryness, improves skin clarity, improves skin elasticity/firmness, improves skin texture, treat and heals eczema, psoriasis, and acne.

Bentonite Clay:  Traps and removes dirt, debris, build up and other particles from your hair and scalp. Bentonite contains over 70 natural occurring trace minerals like: High in Silica- 61.4% (required for strong healthy hair growth and skin tissue regeneration)

ON SKIN:  

Excellent to rejuvenate and cleanse the skin. It draws excess oils and debris to the surface, boosts circulation to tighten the skin and stimulate blood flow, and whisks away dead skin cells that can clog pores.

Amla Powder:  Promotes hair growth, adds shine and volume and strengthens hair.

ON SKIN:  

Rejuvenates the skin, repairs damaged tissue and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles.  A natural astringent.

Aloe Butter: contains minerals, vitamins, amino acids, enzymes and proteins that makes hair and skin soft and moisturized.

Honey: Has moisturizing, conditioning benefits on hair and natural cleanser on skin.

Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces

NOTE: Color may vary from batch to batch, may appear darker or lighter than photo shown. This is normal during a 4-6 weeks curing process.

Price shown is for one bar of soap

*Lye is necessary to make soap, however a cured/finished bar of soap does not contain any lye*

name: Aloe & Hibiscus Shampoo Bar
description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps.
No Synthethic Fragrances or Colorants

This is a moisturizing shampoo bar formulated for gentle washing and hair that is not in need of clarifying.  Lots of lather  to thoroughly cleanse hair.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Sunflower Oil, Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Aloe Butter, Mango Butter, Castor Oil, Hibiscus Petal Flower, Oxide colorant and Blackberry Fragrance

Aloe Butter: contains minerals, vitamins, amino acids, enzymes and proteins that makes hair and skin soft and moisturized.

Hibiscus Petal Powder - helps promote growth, gives hair nice shine and prevents hair loss and split ends...also relieves dry scalp.

MANGO BUTTER- contains natural emollient qualities that help keep the skin moisturized, therefore when applied to the scalp it restores and maintains the moisture and promotes cell regeneration


Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces

NOTE: Color may vary from batch to batch, may appear darker or lighter than photo shown. This is normal during a 4-6 weeks curing process.

Price shown is for one bar of soap

*Lye is necessary to make soap, however a cured/finished bar of soap does not contain any lye*

Australian Pink Clay is great for hydrating the skin, to refining delicate lines, moisturizes, and improve the overall texture of the skin, even the most sensitive skin.

French Green Clay absorbs and removes impurities from the skin, stimulating blood flow to create healthy and glowing skin.

Can be used as a face and body soap.

GOAT MILK: is a well known beauty aid in fighting and treating serious skin conditions such as eczema and psoriasis, it conditions the skin and is highly moisturizing and can serve as a great exfoliant.

COLLOIDAL OATMEAL: works great to help relieve dry, skin patches (eczema), psoriasis, acne.  Soothes and reduces itching.

Can be used as a face and body soap.

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil,  Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Mango Butter, Castor Oil, Green Tea, Chai Tea, Fragrance Blend of White Tea, Ginger and Pear 

Mango Butter is highly emollient, softening and soothing to the skin.

Green Tea is considered to be anti-bacterial/anti-septic and possess antioxidants that are great for protecting the skin.

description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps 

A great cleansing soap that provides antibacterial properties and gently clears irritations from acne, rashes etc. 

Has a light, citrus scent

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil, Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Rice Bran Oil, Lemon Peel Powder, Green Tea Extract, Shea Butter and Castor Oil, Essential Oils of Lemon and Tea Tree

Lemon Peel Powder - The powder works its magic on the skin and leaves it fresh and clean. Can be used as an astrigent to help tighten the skin, helps skin maintain natural oil balance to give it a glow.

Green Tea Extract - is naturally rich in antioxidants, which has a cell-protecting function as well. It’s a strong antioxidant effect that protects the skin from the damaging effect of free radicals.  Green tea extract can actually decrease wrinkles and also makes you look younger

Tea Tree Oil - is anti bacterial, anti fungal, anti-septic, and with germicidal properties. Really good for treating acne, clears irritations, and rashes and reduces inflammation.
 

Can be used as a face and body soap.

Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces

name: Cafe'Chino Soap Bar
description:
Handmade, Cold Processed Soaps.
No Synthethic Fragrances or Colorants

This soap is best to use when trying to reduce the appearance of scars, stretch marks and varicos veins.  Follow up with our Five Blend Tummy Butter as a moisturizer.

*Smells very edilble but for EXTERNAL use only*

Ingredients: Distilled Water, Coconut Oil, Palm Oil, Olive Oil,  Avocado Oil, Sodium Hydroxide (Lye), Raw Cocoa Butter, Coffee Butter, Castor Oil, Cocoa Powder, Fresh Coffee Grounds, Chocolate Espresso Fragrance 

RAW COCOA BUTTER - It lubricates and protects the skin and also helps to fade scars, natural moisturizer which softens and can be easily absorbed by the skin

COFFEE BUTTER – Reduces the appearance of cellulite, heals stretch marks and scarring, tightens and tones skin, softens and hydrates skin for a glowing, youthful look.  Coffee Butter also has a 4.5 pH balance which is the same as human skin and the reason why it helps protect against and get rid of acne and blemishes.

FRESH COFFEE GROUNDS-

Scrubbing action typically increases blood flow and may reduce the appearance of cellulite and varicose veins. 
Caffeine is a vasodilator, which means it constricts blood vessels in the skin. This action works to make blood vessels tighter and firmer very quickly, which is reflected in your skin texture


Soaps are between 4.5 and 5 ounces
